text: Walter Sedlmayr was born on 6 January 1926. He was a popular German stage, television, and movie actor. He was born in Bavaria. He was killed by two men who were half-brothers on 14 July 1990. Category:1926 births Category:1990 deaths Category:German stage actors Category:German television actors Category:German movie actors Category:Actors from Bavaria
title: Walter Sedlmayr
